issues.title: Insurance Not Honoring Approved Pre-authorization
issues.message: Despite an approved pre-authorization (PA-2024-00231) for ₹500,000.00, the insurance company has covered ₹0.00 of the ₹400,000.00 hospital bill. This indicates a significant issue with claim processing or coverage application, leaving the patient with a substantial balance.
issues.suggested_action: Immediately contact Red INsurance to clarify why the approved pre-authorization is not being honored and why no amount has been covered. Review the claim submission details against the pre-authorization conditions and approved procedures to identify any discrepancies or unmet requirements.

issues.title: Financial Data Inconsistency
issues.message: There is an inconsistency in the provided financial details: The Total Hospital Bill (₹400,000.00) minus the Amount Covered by Insurance (₹0.00) implies a patient responsibility of ₹400,000.00. However, the Patient's Balance is stated as ₹350,000.00. This discrepancy of ₹50,000.00 needs clarification.
issues.suggested_action: Verify the exact patient responsibility and any payments already made by the patient or other sources to reconcile the total bill with the stated patient's balance.

issues.title: Medication Order Pending Dispense
issues.message: Pharmacy order for Jondise (RX-002) is currently pending and has not been dispensed. This medication is required for discharge.
issues.suggested_action: Follow up immediately with the pharmacy to expedite the dispensing of Jondise.

issues.title: New Discharge Medication Order Missing/Pending
issues.message: Insulin Glargine is listed as a discharge prescription, but no corresponding pharmacy order status was found, implying it has not been ordered or dispensed.
issues.suggested_action: Initiate a pharmacy order for Insulin Glargine and ensure it is filled and dispensed prior to discharge.

issues.title: Medication-Allergy Conflict Identified
issues.message: Dolo-Crosine (generic: Acetaminophen Extended) is prescribed despite the patient's known 'Liver complaint' allergy. Acetaminophen is hepatotoxic and should be used with extreme caution or avoided in patients with liver issues.
issues.suggested_action: Review the Dolo-Crosine prescription with the prescribing physician. Consider an alternative analgesic or a lower, liver-safe dosage with close monitoring of liver function.

issues.title: Discharge Medication Payment Pending
issues.message: Payment for Dolo-Crosine is pending. This must be cleared before discharge.
issues.suggested_action: Contact patient or responsible party to clear payment for Dolo-Crosine.

issues.title: Discharge Medication Payment Pending
issues.message: Payment for Jondise is pending. This must be cleared before discharge.
issues.suggested_action: Contact patient or responsible party to clear payment for Jondise.

issues.title: Discharge Medication Payment Pending
issues.message: Payment for Insulin Glargine is pending. This must be cleared before discharge.
issues.suggested_action: Contact patient or responsible party to clear payment for Insulin Glargine.

issues.title: Ambulance Transport Required
issues.message: Patient has Liver Cancer and Excess Panting, requiring medical supervision and monitoring during transport. An ALS ambulance is recommended.
issues.suggested_action: Book an ALS ambulance for the patient.

issues.title: Final Invoice Not Generated
issues.message: The final invoice for patient P00231 has not yet been generated. Discharge cannot proceed without a finalized bill.
issues.suggested_action: Generate the final invoice immediately and ensure all charges are accurately reflected. This is a critical blocker for discharge.

issues.title: Pending Billing Adjustments
issues.message: There are pending adjustments that need to be finalized before discharge. This includes insurance pre-authorization and dialysis procedure billing, which could impact the final patient balance.
issues.suggested_action: Expedite the approval of insurance pre-authorization and finalize all pending procedure billings. Ensure these are reflected in the final invoice.

issues.title: Required Chest X-Ray is Pending
issues.message: The required Chest X-Ray test has a 'pending' status and has not been completed. Discharge cannot proceed until this test is completed and reviewed.
issues.suggested_action: Expedite completion of the Chest X-Ray and review results immediately.

issues.title: Critical RBC Value in Complete Blood Count
issues.message: The Red Blood Cell (RBC) count is critically low (2.8 10^6/uL), which is below the critical threshold of 3.0 10^6/uL. This requires immediate medical attention.
issues.suggested_action: Review RBC results with a physician and determine appropriate medical intervention before discharge. Further investigation into the cause of low RBC may be necessary.

issues.title: Critical Platelets Value in Complete Blood Count
issues.message: The Platelets count is critically high (960 10^3/uL), which is above the critical threshold of 450 10^3/uL. This requires immediate medical attention.
issues.suggested_action: Review Platelets results with a physician and determine appropriate medical intervention before discharge. Further investigation into the cause of high Platelets may be necessary.

issues.title: Critical Hemoglobin Value in Complete Blood Count
issues.message: The Hemoglobin level is critically low (8.2 g/dL), which is below the critical threshold of 10.0 g/dL. This requires immediate medical attention.
issues.suggested_action: Review Hemoglobin results with a physician and determine appropriate medical intervention before discharge. Further investigation into the cause of low Hemoglobin may be necessary.
